plugin.name: FX-DFX
plugin.description: Implementation of the CTBTO/IDC polar analysis for three-component stations.

binding.name: FX-DFX
binding.description: Implementation of the CTBTO/IDC polar analysis for three-component stations.

group.name: DFX
group.description: Three component feature extraction algorithm ported from the automatic processing system implemented at CTBTO/IDC. The documentation of the methods is not publically available. In case of questions and comments, please contact support@ctbto.org.

group.name: filter
group.description: Butterworth filter options of the bandpass.

parameter.name: loFreq
parameter.description: The lower cut-off frequency. A negative value or zero will disable a lower cut-off frequency.

parameter.name: hiFreq
parameter.description: The upper cut-off frequency. A negative value or zero will disable a upper cut-off frequency.

parameter.name: window
parameter.description: Length of the covariance window in seconds.

parameter.name: overlap
parameter.description: The fraction of the covariance window to overlap.

parameter.name: alpha
parameter.description: A station-dependent parameter used to compute a polarization slowness estimate.

parameter.name: ds
parameter.description: A station-dependent parameter used to compute the back azimuth and slowness errors.

parameter.name: dk
parameter.description: A station-dependent parameter used to compute the back azimuth and slowness errors.
